node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Binomo Online trading on August 10, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'A BD TRADING IDEAS FROM BINOMO ANALYSTS IN STORIES! 11/8-18/8'.

node.text:
On 11 to 17 August, we will be publishing Binomo analysts' tips and offer useful quizzes in Stories!⁣
⁣
 In a week you will find out:⁣
⁣
🔹The advantages of a demo account;⁣
🔹How and why you should use the economic calendar;⁣
🔹How much money you need for investing;⁣
🔹How you can handle negative trading experiences.⁣
⁣
 Follow the Stories and remember to put your ideas into practice!⁣
⁣
🚩 The financial operations offered on this site may involve increased risk. Please evaluate all the financial risks before trading.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Binomo Online trading on August 08, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'TRAINING TRADING STEP BY STEP Step four: making decisions'.

node.text:
There are certain correct and incorrect methods of collecting information and making decisions for any trading style. But a few questions always arise: what data should I collect? And most importantly, for what? 🤔⁣
⁣
 Let's start with the last question: for what? Well, to understand the general situation on the market and make key decisions: is it a good idea to trade today? Is the market right for my trading style?⁣
⁣
 Now, a few words about what information to collect:⁣
⁣
◾️Market volatility: how close to average has the market been behaving in recent sessions.⁣
◾️General mood: whether you might expect any events that could affect the market.⁣
◾️The market's recent behavior in a similar but already completed pattern.⁣
⁣
 In general, you will see only three options before you start trading:⁣
⁣
🔹You understand that you have an advantage on the market. For example, you are a trend trader and there is already a trend on the market. In that case, you can trade.⁣
🔹You see the market abruptly. Some situations are familiar to you, and some are not. So, you can trade, but do it using strategies and tactics with a moderate level of risk.⁣
🔹You see that the market is not going to work for your techniques and strategies. And it will most likely remain so until the end of the day. In that case, it would be best to forget about trading that day.⁣
⁣
 If you collect all the necessary data and do some quick fundamental analysis, you will improve yourself as a trader and be taking a big step in your trading career. So, follow these simple rules and rock the market 😉⁣
⁣
🚩 The financial operations offered on this site may involve increased risk. Please evaluate all the financial risks before trading.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Binomo Online trading on August 06, 2021. May be an image of jewelry and text that says 'Join our community of VIP traders!'.

node.text:
Each and every Binomo trader is offered a lot of possibilities. However, it is VIP traders who know how to maximize their benefits and achieve top results.⁣
⁣
 Let's take at look at bonuses that VIP traders are using right now!⁣
⁣
 💎 Personal manager: individual advice on trading, analysis of the market situation, assistance in addressing any issues;⁣
 💎Investment insurance: you can use it to protect your investments and get part of your funds back;⁣
💎 Cashback: every week VIP traders can get up to 10%;⁣
💎 Special offers: participation in private tournaments, risk-free trades, bonuses of up to 200%;⁣
💎 Happy Hours: if your forecast is correct, your returns can be as high as 90%.⁣
⁣
 Still have questions about the VIP status? We will be happy to answer them in the comments ⬇️⁣
⁣
🚩 The financial operations offered on this site may involve increased risk. Please evaluate all the financial risks before trading.

node.text:

⁣
From August 4–10, use the MEGAUGFB promo code when funding your account and the amount of your deposit will double 😉⁣
⁣
We wish you successful trading!

🚩 The financial operations offered on this site may involve increased risk. Please evaluate all the financial risks before trading.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Binomo Online trading on August 02, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'How do bonuses work and where can you find them?'.

node.text:
Gifts are always nice, so we like to delight you with special bonuses frequently. In anticipation of our next profitable offer, we suggest you learn about what bonuses are and how they work 😉⁣
⁣
There are deposit and no-deposit bonuses on Binomo.⁣
⁣
🔹No-deposit bonuses are usually awarded during contests. In order to use them, you do not need a promo code — your manager will credit it to your account. All you need to do is collect your bonus in the "gifts" section of the platform.⁣
⁣
🔹A deposit bonus is a bonus that you need to enter a promo code for in the "Cashier" section. They can be found in the "Promotions" and "Gifts" sections of the platform's website, on Binomo's social media, as well as in your email if you are on our mailing list.⁣
⁣
📍A feature of deposit bonuses is that in order to withdraw funds after activating them, you need to complete trading turnover that exceeds the amount of the bonus by 35-40 times. Since there is no time limit on using the promo code, you can trade as usual and not rush to complete the trading turnover.⁣
⁣
Details on bonuses can be found on the account crediting page after choosing your deposit method by clicking "Bonuses, offers, coupons" 🧐⁣
⁣
If you still have any questions, please write them in the comments. New bonus coming soon 🥳🚩 The financial operations offered on this site may involve increased risk. Please evaluate all the financial risks before trading.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Binomo Online trading on July 30, 2021. May be an image of screen and text that says 'INDICATORS CCI'.

node.text:
CCI was developed in 1980 by Donald Lambert. It is an oscillator that looks like RSI but has its features and advantages. So, what is so special about CCI, and how to use it to achieve effective trading?⁣
⁣
​​Using CCI, you can see:⁣
🔹strong market trends;⁣
🔹overbought and oversold zones;⁣
🔹market divergence.⁣
⁣
 The overbought zone starts at the ＋100 level. Crossing this mark means that there is a strong uptrend in the market. The oversold area starts from -100. As soon as the indicator falls below this point, traders consider it a downtrend.⁣
⁣
 A divergence signal occurs when the CCI movement does not match with the price chart. For example, if the indicator moves downwards and the price continues to grow, there is a high chance that the trend will change to a downward one. It works vice versa, too: if the CCI started to rise during a downward trend, but the price is still falling, traders should expect its growth.⁣
⁣
 The best timeframes to use this indicator are 30 or 60 minutes ⏱⁣
⁣
 The CCI indicator itself is a reliable source of trading signals. But as a confirmation of them, you can use it with MACD, Stochastic, Bollinger Bands, and Moving Averages.  So, are you ready to try CCI in action? Then check out our new strategy! ➡️🚩 The financial operations offered on this site may involve increased risk. Please evaluate all the financial risks before trading.

Photo by Binomo Online trading on July 28, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'HOW DO HOLIDAYS AFFECT THE FINANCIAL MARKET?'.

node.text:
The financial market is not only influenced by economic events, but also by holidays, seasons, and even the weather! These factors are related to fundamental analysis. So, let's figure out why this happens?⁣
⁣
🥳The first reason is that there are fewer active traders on the market during holidays. Or vice versa: there might be more traders than usual, like when companies release their annual or quarterly reports.⁣
⁣
🎄One of the most crucial months when the market behaves spontaneously is January, since many traders have new funds to enter the market with. As a result, they are likely to push up prices.⁣
⁣
📆 Prices also often change ahead of long weekends and three-day holidays, such as Thanksgiving and Independence Day.⁣
On the American market, September is historically the lowest point of the year. The reason for that is that it's the end of summer, which is marked by Labor Day on the first Monday in September.⁣
⁣
🥱Believe it or not, the first day of the week traditionally is the worst day for trading. As analysts say, the average daily return for Mondays is a loss of about 1%! The effect is psychological: most people are not enthusiastic about getting back into their daily routine after the weekend.⁣
⁣
🌪Even the weather can affect market activity. For example, the market often drops following an event like a hurricane or blizzard. This happens because people have other things to do rather than trading: they need to deal with property damage, injuries, or lost sales due to business closures.⁣
⁣
🌧And lastly, one theory states that weather affects our mood, and the trader's mood affects their behavior. Thus, as analysts say, trading during good weather is more active than during bad weather.⁣
⁣
However, you should remember that seasonal and weather trends do not apply all the time and should only be a single factor in your trading strategy 😉🚩 The financial operations offered on this site may involve increased risk. Please evaluate all the financial risks before trading.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Binomo Online trading on July 25, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'INDICATORS OSCILLATORS'.

node.text:
Oscillators are technical analysis indicators that can inform us about price reversals in advance. Traders most often use oscillators on sideways markets to receive signals when there isn't a clearly defined trend.⁣
⁣
We can separate oscillators into two groups – leading and lagging⁣
⁣
🔹 Leading oscillators indicate a price reversal or the beginning of a new trend even before the signal itself appears on the market. As a result, they are ahead of the price, and traders can use these indicators effectively during their trading sessions.⁣
⁣
The most common leading indicators are:⁣
▪️ RSI⁣
▪️ Stochastic⁣
▪️ CCI⁣
⁣
🔹Lagging oscillators are indicators that follow the price. Simply put, the price changes first, and only then does the indicator show a trend. That means you won't be able to catch the very beginning of that movement. However, these indicators will still indicate changes on the market with high accuracy.⁣
⁣
Lagging oscillators include:⁣
▪️ Bollinger Bands⁣
▪️ MACD⁣
⁣
Pros and cons of oscillators❕⁣
⁣
➕Oscillators accurately show the situation on the market.⁣
➕They are very easy to use.⁣
➕They are perfect for determining a decrease in trend strength.⁣
⁣
➖One disadvantage of oscillators is the quality of their signals.⁣
➖It is also worth noting that the moment sideways movement turns into a trend is when oscillators often give false signals.⁣
➖Another disadvantage is that they don't have ideal settings. Yes, there are recommended settings, but they often need to be reconfigured to the current situation on the market.⁣
⁣
Analysts recommend configuring the tool based on the tips for your strategy. If you want to get one, leave a comment! If we receive 10 comments, we'll publish a unique strategy using oscillators 😉🚩 The financial operations offered on this site may involve increased risk. Please evaluate all the financial risks before trading.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Binomo Online trading on July 24, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'WHAT WOULD HAVE HAPPENED IF YOU INVESTED IN THE WORLD'S MOST WELL-KNOWN COMPANIES TEN YEARS AGO?'.

node.text:
It's fun to travel back in time in our minds and imagine "what if" scenarios. "What if I had chosen a different profession?" or "what if I had bought Bitcoin when it was $120?" 🤔⁣
⁣
Unfortunately, we cannot build a time machine, but we can look at some winners from the past and try to find similar opportunities in the present. So, here are five companies and their paths to success within the last ten years 🔝⁣
⁣
Netflix 🎬⁣
The company started out delivering DVDs by mail in the early 2000s. But when video streaming over the internet made it no longer necessary to have physical copies to view content, Netflix made sure to become the first mover in that category. As a result, the company has gained huge success and now in 2021, it is considered a dominating media giant with a net worth of over $30 billion.⁣
⁣
Amazon 🛍⁣
Amazon consistently adds new products and services for its consumers. As a result, it has become one of the most influential companies globally. Just imagine: a $1,000 investment in Amazon 10 years ago would have provided those investors with almost $20,000 by 2021!⁣
⁣
Microsoft 🖥⁣
Microsoft is one of the leading software companies. The company's stock has performed rather well the past few years. It's still considered one of the safest stocks you can invest in.⁣
⁣
Starbucks 🥤⁣
As the world's largest coffeehouse chain, Starbucks represents the United States' coffee culture. If you'd invested in the company ten years ago, that decision would have paid off. For example, a $1,000 investment made in January 2011 would be worth nearly $8,000 in July 2021.⁣
⁣
Tesla 🚙⁣
Although many Wall Street analysts say Tesla's stock price is a bubble that will eventually pop, it has grown more than 20,000% since 2010, and has become the highest-valued automotive company in history. There's another factor investors can't pass over: the eccentric, meme-loving chief executive Elon Musk, who has become an inspiration to millions of people.⁣
⁣
🚩 The financial operations offered on this site may involve increased risk. Please evaluate all the financial risks before trading.
